text: Alex posted this adorable family selfie at the game. “ Friday night, family night, ” Alex captioned the pic featuring his daughters Natasha and Ella and J. Lo ’ s twins Emme and Max. The couple ’ s kids may not be related, but they could still pass for siblings! Emme and Ella are so close that the nine - year - olds even shared a seat at one point. Meanwhile, Max got so tuckered out that he fell asleep during the game! According to insiders, the couple ’ s kids are eager for them to get married. “ All the kids want Jennifer and Alex to get married, ” a source told People, adding that the kids already “ act like siblings and are very sweet together. ”
